about_the_game:
Default is  English，if need change language,follow below:

（English英语）start-(Choose one file，double click)-continue-done-options-language-change other language-save-restart。

(Chinese中文) 开始-（选择个文档，双击）-完成-选项-language-换其他的语言-save-重启游戏。

Newly added weather system, ground vegetation, and human deformation.

Open world,Can be played as a Single player game or Multiplayer game

70+Monster and 20 Female NPC and 20 Male NPC,All of them can be controlled by pressing "E".

100+Skill can be used.

Skills Include Ice(1-29),Stone(1-29),Fire(1-31),Wind(1-29),Electric(1-12),Buff(1-25)

Female NPC:

1Left click attack will produce range blocking effect after landing(They all have different VFX).

2Right click attack is a missile lock attack(They all have different VFX).Need to confirm the target with the Num 7 first(Missile robots and slime also need to confirm the target with the Number 7).The target will be cleared after a certain period of time and needs to be confirmed again by pressing the Number 7.

3They can also use Skills in skillbar based on atrribute (such as ice)(Skillbar has 10 slot.The skill book is dropped by monsters or purchased from the store.When selling items, stand near the item and sell.

use the default protagonist and Press "F" to add it to inventory.

and Press"B" to open inventory,and Press"Add to SkillBar" in inventory.

then ues "E" to control other character,and use the corresponding 0-9 to release skills,use "Q" to confirm location.The role used must have corresponding attributes to be used.There are beginner tutorial pictures in the game).

The skill book requires corresponding attributes:

（Skill book that Female NPC with "Ice" attribute can use）Ice1-20,Buff1-4.

（Skill book that Female NPC with "Stone" attribute can use）Stone1-20.

（Skill book that Female NPC with "Fire" attribute can use）Fire1-20,Buff5-10.

（Skill book that Female NPC with "Wind" attribute can use) Wind1-20,Buff18-25.

(Skill book that Female NPC with "Electirc" attribute can use) Electric1-7,Buff11-17.

Male NPC:

Most male npc have exclusive weapons and shields.

1Left click and directional key(W,A,S,D) attack will produce different action(Only available for 12 male NPCs Holding shields).After confirming the target with "7", it can rotate to the target direction.

2Right click attack (Press and Release)will recall exclusive weapon or shield on the nearby ground first,then right click attack will throwing exclusive weapon or shield with different VFX.Those without shields can press "O" to move to the weapon position.Some can charge and flash attacks by pressing "Z" and "C".

3(same as female3)They can also use Skills in skillbar based on atrribute (such as ice)(Skillbar has 10 slot.The skill book is dropped by monsters or purchased from the store,use the default protagonist and Press "F" to add it to inventory,and Press"B" to open inventory,and Press"Add to SkillBar" in inventory,then ues "E" to control other character,and use the corresponding 0-9 to release skills,use "Q" to confirm location.The role used must have corresponding attributes to be used.There are beginner tutorial pictures in the game).

The skill book requires corresponding attributes:

（Skill book that Male NPC with "Fire" attribute can use）Fire17-28,Buff5-10.

(Skill book that Male NPC with "Wind" attribute can use) Wind12,17-27,Buff18-25.

(Skill book that Male NPC with "Electric" attribute can use) Electric1-7,Buff11-17.

Exclusive Shield Skill:
Block is "H".

(NPC Name:LaoZheng老郑)Wind27,(NPC Name:XiaoFeng小冯)Electric7,(NPC Name:XiaoChen小陈)Electric8,(NPC Name:XiaoChu小褚)Fire29,(NPC Name:XiaoWei小卫)Electric9,(NPC Name:LaoHan老韩)Wind28,(NPC Name:XiaoYang小杨)Electric10,(NPC Name:XiaoQin小秦)Wind29, (NPC Name:XiaoQian小钱)Electric11,(NPC Name:LaoYou老尤)Fire30,(NPC Name:XiaoXu小许)Electric12,(NPC Name:LaoZhao老赵)Fire 31.

Monster：

All Monsters have different actions and attribute and dropped items.

Easy monsters have actions only.When "E" appears, it can be QTE by protagonist(Press"E"),it will not drop item after QTE.

Advanced Monsters have actions and 1-3 Skills.Skills will be released based on corresponding actions.

Boss Monsters have actions and 5-6 Skills.Left click and directional key(W,A,S,D) attack will produce different action.Skills will be released based on corresponding actions.

After confirming the target with "7", it can rotate to the target direction.
Some can charge and flash attacks by pressing "Z" and "C".

Some need to use "Q" to confirm location.

Build

Press the 'number 0' to open, and construction can only be carried out on green ground. (Sometimes there is a bug when opening that can cause the scrollbar on the build interface to jam, making it impossible to pull down the menu. Simply press the "number 0" again).

Some plants can upgrade and even obtain fruits(It needs to be created directly and requires a attack by left mouse click).

Some plants are built on soil, with two blue sky backgrounds in the construction.

Wood Collection

Stone Collection

Metal Increase

When selling items,Place the item on the ground,Both the person and the item need to be located near the store.

Press the space to fly up,Ctrl to fly down,WASD control direction

Only the default protagonist can do: pick up items,build houses and plants, collect and sell upgraded plants, purchase skills, switch weapons or shields with differents actions ,riding horses, driving carriages, driving robots, controlling cranes and all flying creatures to fly, and controlling all swimming creatures to swim,etc.

Conventional weapons and shields are equipped with "U" buttons, while one built-in weapon is equipped with "J" buttons.

The protagonist on the beach,He is an NPC,It provides dialogue for the plot too.He only have actions.You can directly use the default protagonist.

Monsters on the beach,It provides dialogue for the plot.Monsters only have actions,not have skills,they are future bosses.

The second key of the combination key,May need to be pressed twice ,for releasing in using handle.

Known problem:

1Sometimes when controlling other characters to cross the map area, the protagonist may not be detected, and the ground may not be loaded, without any collisions,It may fall below the ground. It is best to leave the controlled character in an area with map lines or a place where the ground can be landed, press "E" to leave cotrolled charater to let the map load, and there will be collisions. If not, you can press "P" or log in to the game again.

When controlling the flying character to go to the Land of Ice Wolf, it is best to fly from the GoblinCave to the Land of Ice Wolf, otherwise there will still be some issues with map loading.

2Sometimes when pressing "P", the blood bar may affect buttons. Just press "P" again to fix it.

3When using "P" to teleport or "E" to control other characters (including cranes), the task may fail. It is best to walk around to complete the task.

4When pressing "P" continuously to transmit, it may fall below the ground. It is best not to transmit continuously, and it is best to move a few steps after transmission before transferring again. After landing on the ground, moving a few steps can teleport to the ground, especially after the character is defeated.

5When a conversation occurs (try not to stay away from the dialogue character). When the player moves away from the dialogue character, the dialogue character will disappears and the dialogue cannot continue. You have to press "P" or log in again to make the dialogue disappear.

6Causing the loading of many scenes may result in a 'FataError', And then it's necessary to restart the game.

After restarted, the area where "FataError" appears may not appear again, and you can also go in a different direction.

If the computer is not functioning properly, you can first set the display in "Options". Or save the location where the document was created. Do not use "Set Location" next step, click "Finish" for using the saved location.

Reducing image quality or running games by administrators can reduce errors.
